name: Dancing Pigmy Hippos
description: Pigmy hippos are fun-loving animals. Let's dance along with pigmy hippos!

name: Elephant the Artist
description: Which colour matches her feeling today? Elephant the artist takes her heart out in her painting.

name: Zebra Parade
description: Be amazed by beautiful zebras marching in front of you!

name: Wombat Family
description: Join us to cuddle the baby wombat or feed the family of wombats.

name: Dark Samll Wonderland with Bilbies
description: Which bilby will reach the goal in the maze first?

name: A day of Mountain Goat
description: Have you been to a mountain? Have you seen these agile furry animal? Join us to learn about moutain goats.

name: Run run run Uribous!
description: Piglets of Japanese boars(uribous) are racing for the prize of sweet potato!

name: Fruits Picking Time
description: Our red pandas are ready to pick fruits. Will they ask you to feed them?

name: Dive Into Platypus School
description: How much do you know about this shy and nocturnal animal? Let's learn how platypus lives.

name: Cold Blooded Hunting Show
description: Beautiful but ruthless snow leopard. Let's see how they catch today's dinner.
